short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add laser sharp focus to lists on any Trello board.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Concentrate on the things that matter; and easily switch focus at the drop of a hat without having to leave Trello.

1. Focus on one or as many columns you need to improve your workflow

2. Easily change which items are focused with a few clicks

3.  Customise focus for each board

4. Sign into Chrome to sync your settings across all devices


Designs by Andrew Sims.
